name: WELCOME to Lingmei's WORLD
body:
### WELCOME
This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance, including homework sets I've authored and Python programs I am working on.

### Python in Finance
We use Python in some of our classes, and here is some of my work:
* [Basics notebook](https://github.com/LingmeiShen/qfrm/blob/master/python-basics-notebook-empty.ipynb)
* [Secret notebook](http://github.com/LingmeiShen/qfrm/python-secret-notebook-empty.ipynb)

### About me
I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I was an undergraduate student majoring in finance in Lingnan College, Sun Yat-sen University in China. I've done research with about the evaluation methods on stock index. 
I enjoy playing sports, including badminton and table tennis. I was a member of college table tennis team when I was an undergraduate student. Besides, I am fond of communicating with different people and joined many volunteer programs before.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
